src:
Jelang Duel Kontra Tira Persikabo, Empat Pemain Persebaya Kurang Fit
05 Nov 2019, 03:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Empat pemain Persebaya Surabaya dalam kondisi yang kurang fit jelang duel kontra Tira Persikabo. Keempatnya adalah Miswar Saputra, Otavio Dutra, Irfan Jaya, dan Muhammad Kemaludin.
Bahkan, Miswar dan Kemaludin absen dalam latihan di Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo, Senin (4/11/2019). Mereka tidak ikut persiapan menghadapi Laskar Padjajaran.
"Miswar demam, kondisinya sakit, sama satu lagi Kemal memang masih belum fit," kata Aji Santoso, pelatih Persebaya usai memimpin latihan.
Sedangkan, untuk Irfan Jaya dan Otavio Dutra, mereka mengikuti latihan sembari pemulihan. Namun, khusus Dutra, dia baru kembali berlatih setelah absen dalam beberapa kesempatan.
"Kalau Dutra juga masih belum seratus persen, Irfan sudah mulai membaik, mudah-mudahan satu dua hari ke depan Irfan membaik," lanjut Aji.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Ahead of the Duel Cons Counter Tira Persikabo, Four Persebaya Players Less Fit
05 Nov 2019, 03:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Four Persebaya Surabaya players in less fit condition ahead of the duel against Tira Persikabo. The four are Miswar Saputra, Otavio Dutra, Irfan Jaya, and Muhammad Kemaludin.
In fact, Miswar and Kemaludin were absent in training at the Sidoarjo Delta Gelora Stadium on Monday (11/04/2019). They did not participate in the preparation to face the Padjadjaran Warriors.
"Miswar has a fever, his condition is sick, and another Kemal is still not fit," said Aji Santoso, the coach of Persebaya after leading the training.
Meanwhile, for Irfan Jaya and Otavio Dutra, they attended training while recovering. However, specifically Dutra, he only returned to training after missing several occasions.
"If Dutra is still not one hundred percent, Irfan has begun to improve, hopefully in the next two days Irfan will improve," continued Aji.
